articles.description: The company, which is backed by yoga guru Ramdev, will use the proceeds from the issue to expand its business, repay some outstanding loans, meet incremental working capital requirements and undertake general corporate activities, it said in an exchange filin…
articles.content:
Ruchi Soya on Friday said that its follow-on public issue worth Rs 4,300 crore is set to open on March 24 and close on March 28.

articles.author: Polly Allcock
articles.title: Yamaha launches the NEO's, a 50cc equivalent electric scooter - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Yamaha has unveiled the NEO's, the company's first electric scooter to launch in Europe. The vehicle has a 2.3 kW motor and can travel up to 24 miles (38.5 km) between charges.
articles.content: Yamaha has launched the NEO's electric scooter, which has power equivalent to a 50cc vehicle. The scooter has a 2.3 kW direct drive hub-mounted motor with Yamaha's latest integrated power unit. This … [+1379 chars]
